sentences.english: The method based on region connectivity analysis and matched template for locating of news video caption.

sentences.chinese: 不得将本字幕内嵌发布。

sentences.english: I watch TV with subtitles and the volume cranked up.
sentences.chinese: 我看的是带字幕的电视节目，音量调得很大。

By the subtitle decoder, the subtitles will be held in SDRAM in the receiver.

sentences.english: Expert translation ensures that subtitling is timed properly and easy to read.
sentences.chinese: 专业的翻译可以保障字幕的同步性和易读性。

sentences.english: It surprised me that this film has got bilingual caption.
sentences.chinese: 令我惊讶的是，这部影片竟然有两语字幕。

sentences.english: I might go into the theater to see the reaction of the audience, or to see if the subtitles were correct.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会入坐看观众反应，或是看看字幕有没有错漏。

sentences.english: In 2005, the backstroke of the west subtitler began a cross cultural conversation.
sentences.chinese: 2005年，西部人谁使字幕开始了跨文化对话仰泳。

sentences.english: Most English TV programs are subtitled.
sentences.chinese: 大部分英语电视节目都有字幕。

sentences.english: Add the finishing touches with a custom soundtrack, voiceovers and titles.
sentences.chinese: 添加一个自定义的配乐，配音和字幕的收尾工作。

sentences.english: You need to provide a timecode for interviewee titles and subtitles.
sentences.chinese: 你需要为被采访者的头衔和字幕提供一个时间码。

sentences.english: Rolling captions are offen used in movie or TV head and end.
sentences.chinese: 滚动字幕是电影或电视中片头和片尾经常使用的手段。

sentences.english: If you decide to use subtitles anyway, don’t blame me for your lack of progress
sentences.chinese: 如果你还是要使用字幕i，没长进可别怪我。

sentences.english: I can't follow it without Chinese subtitles.
sentences.chinese: 没有中文字幕我看不懂。

definition: opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
amateur pirated DVD, made e.g. by shooting a running movie
end credits (of a movie etc)/ending (of a movie etc)
standard definition (TV or video image quality)
mojibake (nonsense characters displayed when software fails to render text according to its intended character encoding)
